title: Software Developer - Cloud Infrastructure Specialist
details: We are looking for a skilled Software Developer with strong expertise in cloud infrastructure and Infrastructure as Code (IaC). This role focuses on building scalable applications and managing cloud resources using modern DevOps practices and tools.
requirements: Solid understanding of CloudFormation and Terraform
Experience with AWS, Azure, or GCP
Proficiency in Python, JavaScript, or Go
Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
responsibilities: Create and manage infrastructure as code
Collaborate with DevOps and infrastructure teams
Participate in code reviews and technical planning
legalStatus: H1B sponsorship available, open to visa holders
